title: Won last game of promos (appears as a win) but lost promos
body:
So my PC crashed (screen went all black) at like minute 4 of the game, I came back at 15 minute. I was 1-1 in promos to Plat 3.
We won the game at minute 30, i helped a lot you can check here: last game of Shen http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=JoKa0Paiva
In post mach screen it appears as a win, not leave or lose and it appear that little box "You are unsucessufull in completing your promos series" ????. In match history i got the win.
And I dont understand... I played more than 15 minutes i Helped lot...It appears as a win and i went plat 4 84 LP, instead of Plat 3, atleast it counted as win for MMR purpose???
CAMON WTF

replies.body: If you were AFK for that long in a match, it's likely that you ended up getting marked as a leaver which would count that game as a loss regardless of if your team won without you being there. This is normal when someone gets marked as a leaver since it wouldn't really be appropriate to reward someone for not helping throughout the whole match.
That is dumb it means if I dc I should just never come back because I can't get a win. Your entire behavior team is terrible at their jobs and should be replaced by 12 year olds.

you are kidding with me right??? I helped a lot, my team won because of me!!! I played 2/3 of the game!! My pc is old, so it took 10 minutes to restart!! This is bullshit, because of shit like that, I will stop playing and buying RP. GJ RITO

LOOK another one: 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AULEwiRA-i-won-my-game-but-it-says-i-lost-a-game-in-my-promo

You seem awfully boastful. I am fairly certain that your teammates, who managed to hold out 4v5 for an entire 11 minutes of the early game, would beg to differ. Immaturity just damages your integrity. It frusturates those dealing with it, and makes the person behaving like that look stupid. Try to understand the perspectives/position of the support team, rather than running along arrogantly throwing a temper-tantrums.
